name: 33 ACRES OF LIFE LAGER
desc: 1848, West Coast convictions of resourcefulness and persistence, the California Common was born. Easy on the alcohol and weighing in on the taste for a complete balance. Fruit like quality is created by fermenting the lager at ale temperatures. Hints at a full-bodied ale yet retains a crisp finish.

name: 33 ACRES OF NIRVANA 6 PACK
desc: 33 Acres is one of Vancouver’s most well-loved craft beer brewers. This West Coast Indian Pale Ale beautifully balances bitter-fresh pine notes with grapefruit rind and candied orange citrus. Try it with some fried chicken for a true taste of nirvana.

This style is evolutionary from a IPA with an assertive hop, lower alcohol content, and slight pine aroma. Low in malt, this beer has a refined quality and a refreshing temperament.

desc: Thanks to summers' launching acclaims, this romantic French Blanchè can willingly co-star any seasons current scenes. Showcasing flare for the prismatic, 33 Acres of Sunshine synthesizes an unfiltered wheat dream. Joining the arrays, glowing hops of Aurora and Styrian Golding awaken subtle anise seeds, dazzling coriander, and candied orange ovations.

name: CZECHVAR
desc: Czechvar lager has a think, rich head and markedly golden yellow colour.  The mild hop aroma balances well with the perfectly synchronized sweet-bitter taste.  The body is medium to robust, which makes the drinker feel like taking another sip.

name: CZECHVAR LAGER
desc: Czechvar pours a crystal clear golden colour. A light carbonation is evident as a few small bubbles rise to the surface after pouring. A delicate hop aroma creates the first sensation on the taste buds. Next an early hop bitterness comes through followed closely by a dry pale malty flavour that is mellowed by the soft mouth feel. This medium-bodied lager reveals an overall character that is clean and dry and that finishes slightly crisp. Overall a beer flavourful enough for a winter thirst reprieve but light enough to quench that heat-induced summer urge for a cold one.

name: DAB ORIGINAL TALL CAN
desc: This fresh, pale brew with its mildly hoppy flavour. It is a harmoniously balanced, crisp and easy-to-drink beer with pleasingly gentle notes of hops and malt. A very well-rounded taste profile with a soft and elegant texture.

name: DAGERAAD - BURNABARIAN TALL CAN
desc: Great for drinking on a sunny patio or to knocking back after a long day’s work, Burnabarian is a table beer, or Belgian-style session ale. Named for the city that Dageraad calls home, Burnabarian is lightly spiced with coriander and is brewed with oats for a silky mouthfeel.

name: DAGERAAD BLONDE
desc: Crowned with a fluffy, white head and graced with a fruity, spicy, citrusy aroma, Dageraad Blonde is the pride of our brewery. A closer inspection reveals a note of nutty pilsner malt, whiff of noble hops, faint note of caramelized sugar and a sweet, floral breath of alcohol.

name: DEAD FROG - AMAZING STONE FRUIT BRUT IPA
desc: A fresh and fruity Brut IPA with juicy hops, real peach and apricot, and a bubbly, dry finish.

name: DEAD FROG - BLUEBERRY BLAST KETTLE SOUR
desc: A crisp sour wheat ale bursting with flavours of lemon and freshly picked blueberries. A great combination for refreshing summer sipping. Limited production.

name: DEAD FROG - JUICE BOX SOUR MIXER TALL CAN
desc: 8 talls cans of Sour Power!  Featuring the Peach Lemonade Kettle Sour, Raspberry Blast Kettle Sour, Warhead Imperial Kettle Sour, and SMS Strawberry Mint Sour.

name: DEEP COVE - MANGO PINEAPPLE SOUR TALL CAN
desc: This tropical fruit sour emits bold flavors of mango and pineapple and finishes with a tart juicy mouthfeel.

name: DESCHUTES - FRESH SQUEEZE IPA CANS
desc: This mouthwateringly delicious IPA gets its flavor from a heavy helping of Citra and Mosaic hops. Don't worry, no fruit was harmed in the making of this beer.

name: DESCHUTES - MIRROR POND PALE ALE CANS
desc: This refreshingly uncomplicated ale is crisp and clean with subtle hints of caramel. It is a delicious everyday ale that has a straightforward single-hop character, floral and citrus notes and smooth maltiness combined to deliver a timeless pale ale.

name: DESCHUTES - WOWZA LO-CAL HAZY PALE ALE CAN
desc: With only 100 calories, 4 g of carbs, 4% abv and a crisp,light finish ,this low cal full-flavored yet crushable citrusy hazy pale ale will make you say "Wowza".

name: DOS EQUIS XX ESPECIAL LAGER
desc: Crisp and refreshing up-front. Light body, the palate is clean, dry grainy and very drinkable with an agreeable biscuit like malt flavor.

name: DRIFTWOOD BREWERY - FAT TUG IPA
desc: Beer geeks love Driftwood Brewery, and justifiably so. Everything the Victoria brewery produces is excellent, but Fat Tug IPA is on a level all its own. Bursting with sweet, citrusy hop aromas and flavours, it doesn't get much better than this.

name: DRIFTWOOD BREWERY - FAT TUG IPA TALL CAN 4-PACK
desc: A classic Northwest IPA, Fat Tug is balanced by a prodigious malt body that showcases the juicy hop character of Amarillo, Cascade and Columbus hop varieties.  Resinous aromas of pine, grapefruit and guava awaken the palate,

name: ERDINGER FOOTBALL PACK
desc: The strength of this classic wheat beer lies in the harmonious balance it achieves between the various aromas. Gently spicy wheat and yeast aromas blend with mildly bitter hops. The invigorating carbon dioxide ensures its typical liveliness. A premium beer whose full-bodied yet elegant character leaves a lasting impression of ultimate Bavarian enjoyment. A truly unique wheat beer!

name: ESTRELLA DAMM TALL CAN
desc: Estrella Damm is a clean pouring golden lager that stands the test of time. Every sip features scents of fresh spices and smooth mouth feel with dense notes of toasted cereal, perfectly balanced by bitter back of mouth tones to give the pride of Barcelona a satisfying aftertaste.

name: FAXE AMBER LAGER TALL CAN
desc: Faxe Amber is a golden amber lager beer with pleasant malt and orange peel notes. It has a very creamy palate with smooth malty flavours on the finish.

name: FAXE PREMIUM LAGER TALL CAN
desc: Faxe Premium is rich and frothy, with a smooth mouth feel, due to the special yeast and pressure-fermentation technique used in the brewing of this beer. The taste is distinctively smooth.

name: FAXE ROYAL STRONG TALL CAN
desc: Faxe Royal Strong is a distinctive beer with 8% alcohol. It has more bite and taste than a traditional lager, but is still easily drinkable with a very bright colour and a light but characteristic taste. It has a finely balanced sweetness.

name: FERNIE - CRAFT COLLECTION CAN
desc: Enjoy a refreshed selection of products for the summer, in this popular Fernie Craft Collection Pack. Three cans of each – Project 9 Pilsner, Slingshot Session IPA, What the Huck Huckleberry Ale and Campout West Coast Pale. A wide variety of brews, perfect for any adventure.

name: FERNIE - PROJECT 9 PILSNER CAN
desc: Brewed right in the Canadian Rockies, Project 9 is a true Bavarian Pilsner with exceptional continental hop flavour that can only be achieved by selection of fine noble hops including the Saaz variety. The use of Munich, Pilsner and Pale western Canadian malts and time honoured brewing methods produces a clean, crisp Bavarian Pilsner that is truly transcendent. People’s Choice “Best Beer” Award at Okanagan Fest of Ale, 2014. Food pairings: Chinese, Indian, Thai or Japanese cuisine go well with Pilsners. Or straight up with a wide selection of cheeses, including blue or a sharp cheddar!

name: FERNIE - SLINGSHOT IPA CAN
desc: Slingshot Session IPA, is an award-winning lower alcohol IPA. Regular IPA imbibers will not be disappointed with this selection of traditional and newer hop cultivars - Cascade, Centennial, Citra, Amarillo. Dry-hopped to provide the distinct citrusy, tropical fruit and pine flavours and aromas.

name: FERNIE BREWING - CAMPOUT WEST COAST PALE ALE
desc: 2019 Canadian Brewing Awards gold medal winner. Brewed in the Rockies, with a taste of the coast, this West Coast Pale Ale is best enjoyed under star-filled skies. A hop forward, light copper coloured Pale Ale with oats added to enhance the body and mouthfeel.

name: FERNIE BREWING - GHOSTRIDER PUMPKIN BROWN ALE
desc: Our classic Brown Ale, brewed with pumpkin, spice and all things nice. Unfiltered to keep the real pumpkin taste alive. Named after a local Fernie legend, Ghostrider stems from our First Trax Brown Ale, with pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg, clove and allspice added to bring you the perfect sip of fall.

name: FERNIE BREWING - HIT THE DECK HAZY IPA CAN
desc: An IPA style made famous by breweries on the East Coast. It's light, cloudy, low in bitterness, but high in hop flavour and aroma. The highest dry hop of Fernie's IPAs, it features juicy, citrusy Amarillo, Mosaic, Falconer's Flight and Azacca hops. Oats added.

name: FERNIE BREWING - HOP TRICK MIXER SIXER CANS
desc: The perfect collection of hoppy brews, all in one good looking 6-pack. The summer edition of our seasonally rotating Hop Trick Mixer Sixer features three of FBC’s favourite IPA’s - Lone Wolf IPA, The Real Peel Grapefruit IPA and Slingshot Session IPA. Perfect for all the hop-heads out there.

name: FERNIE BREWING - JAVA THE HUT COFFEE MILK STOUT TALL CAN
desc: With a rich infusion of roasted Crowsnest Coffee, this creamy Stout is a truly satisfying brew, any time of day.The popular Crowsnest Coffee Roasters supply our blend of coffee beans for this brew. These are added to the mash, along with a decadent amount of Chocolate, Roasted and Black malts.

name: FERNIE BREWING - THE REAL PEEL GRAPEFRUIT IPA TALL CAN
desc: A light-coloured IPA, with bold citrusy and grapefruit flavours. Fernie uses grapefruit peel and citrusy hops of Amarillo, Centennial and Citra to produce this refreshing IPA.

name: FOUR WINDS - HUFTGOLD TALL CAN
desc: Huftgold has a bright, malty body with a mellow, yet pronounced hop profile. A crisp, easy-drinking German-Style Pilsner.

name: FOUR WINDS - IPA
desc: Sharp citrus pith and pine resin are front and center in this west coast style IPA.

name: FOUR WINDS - NECTAROUS DRY HOPPED SOUR
desc: Cut through carbs with a tart pucker. Four Wind's Nectarous Dry Hopped Sour still stands as one of BC best sour beers to date. It delivers a cornucopia of bright nectarine, peach, passion fruit, pineapple and citrus notes in a tart but balanced profile.

name: FRULI - STRAWBERRY BEER
desc: Fruli is a unique blend of Belgian white beer and real strawberry juice, produced at a craft brewery in Melle near Ghent in Belgium. It’s a 300 year old brewery called Huyghe which has been in the De Laet family for 100 years. The juice complements the zestiness of the wheat beer and the result is a balanced and refreshing beer that is packed with strawberry fruit flavour. All natural with no sugar added.

name: FUGGLES & WARLOCK - KIWAMI PLUM SOUR CAN
desc: A delicately tart wheat kettle sour brewed with fresh plums.

name: FUGGLES & WARLOCK - RAIDEN BLACK RYE IPA
desc: A black rye IPA with pungent citrus and black currant aromas from West Coast hops and slight pepperiness from rye is balanced with a roasty, yet smooth mouthfeel.

name: FUGGLES & WARLOCK - THE LAST STRAWBERRY WIT
desc: A refreshing Belgian wit brewed with fresh strawberries and sweetened with lactose. Delicately sweet and slightly tart. Keep refrigerated.

name: FULLERS LONDON PRIDE TALL CAN
desc: Brewed to 4.7%, this tawny-coloured premium ale borrows sweet raisin, biscuit and dried-fruit notes from the Crystal malt, while fresh, piney herbs emanate from the hops. Rich, smooth and elegant on the palate, it draws to a clean, satisfying finish with beautifully balanced bitterness.

name: GLUTENBERG - BLONDE ALE GLUTEN FREE TALL CAN
beer_type: Domestic Beer - Outside of BC Beer
desc: Glutenberg’s award winning gluten-free Blonde is airy and lemony and reveals floral and lightly herbal notes, making room for a dry and tasty finale. The brewery’s first creation, it paved the road to success and still imposes itself as a thirst-quenching beer that can charm any palate.

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND - BREWER'S CHOICE WINTER 2020 TALL CAN
desc: The new Winters Brewer's Choice provides a great mix for sharing among friends, with the opportunity to try both new Granville Island Winter seasonals. Brewer's Choice includes BC's favourite winter beer, Lions Winter Ale, a brand new Cranberry Orange Wheat Ale, West Coast IPA and German-Style Pilsner.

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND - ENGLISH BAY ALE CAN
desc: Prominent caramel malt sweetness and low bitterness results in an easy-drinking, approachable ale with lots of flavour and spicy roasted notes.

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND - ISLAND CERVEZA TALL CAN
desc: Exceptionally crisp, smooth and light tasting lager. Brewed Cuban style with real cane sugar and sublte rum notes.

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND - LIONS WINTER ALE CAN
desc: Roasted flavours matched with layers of sweet chocolate, vanilla & toffee. Can compliment a rich and sweet dessert or contrast salty and briny dishes.

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND - NORTHWEST PALE ALE TALL CAN
desc: Inspired by classic American Pale Ales, Granville’s Northwest Pale Ale blends Cascade and Centennial hops to create a most drinkable beer that is hop-forward, yet not over-the-top, with big citrus flavour and a full floral aroma.

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND - SIP EASY CAN
desc: Supremely sessionable and refreshing, Sip Easy Lager is the ideal balance between full flavour and easy drinking. It's no compromises, no concessions � just 120 calories per serving, it's crafted for those who just want to keep it easy.

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND - WEST COAST IPA CAN
desc: West Coast IPA is full of bright, punchy hop flavours and is rounded out by a subtle malt character. The hops deliver a fruity, floral, citrus mix of flavours with tropical notes.

name: GRANVILLE ISLAND - WEST COAST IPA TALL CAN

Adding the zest of premium oranges and Saskatchewan coriander creates refreshing citrus notes with a subtle spice. Its slightly cloudy appearance is proof that we’d never filter out the rich, complex flavours.
